Shokaract and the Mob stood their ground, though, waiting for Necromancer t=
o make a move...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 10:22 AM
  Subject: =
Re: Cease fire


  Necromancer remains ducked low in the crater where he fo=
und cover. he kept his head high enough to see his opponents and his weapon=
 aimed toward the mob. The bot placed a scaled hand on his side fealing som=
ething draining out, "Slag, I'm worse than I thought." the bot had sprung a=
 leak due to the injuries he'd taken. He wanted to transform so his repair =
systems could do thier job but knew a giant dragon, especially a wounded on=
e that couldn't fly would be to easy a target to pass up.
    ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
    From: Alloran2@... 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
  Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 5:42 PM
    Subject: Cease fire


    :=
::Sharpedge/Godfather::: 

    Sharpedge: Alright then, well continue this =
cease fire. 
    ::They look at Necromancer and keep their guns ready in ca=
se he fires:: 

          eGroups Sponsor 
             
                  =
    www.
